pages.title: Go Fishing
pages.text: Send your companion to fish at a nearby water source.$(br2)$(li)The companion finds a suitable fishing spot$(li)Casts the line and waits for a bite$(li)Catches fish, treasure, and junk items$(li)Earns $(bold)3 XP$() per catch$(br2)Example: $(thing)"Go fishing"$() or $(thing)"Catch me some fish"$(br2)Make sure the companion has a fishing rod in its inventory!
